text: Anthony Michael Lazzeri (December 6, 1903 â€“ August 6, 1946) was a Major League Baseball player, mostly for the New York Yankees. He is a member of the Baseball Hall of Fame. He won the World Series with the Yankees in 1927, 1928, 1932, 1936, and 1937. ==Other websites== * Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco Category:Brooklyn Dodgers players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:New York Giants (NL) players Category:New York Yankees players Category:National Baseball Hall of Fame members Category:1903 births Category:1946 deaths
title: Tony Lazzeri
